function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["High energy use during unoccupied periods","High air pollution levels","Emissions of vocs, risk of surface contamination","Increased waste","Noise pollution","Disruption of global settlement system","Inadequate emergency preparedness","Inadequate supplies","Exclusion from government support","Ineffective use of open government projects","Disruption of construction projects","Insufficient funding for green space","Increase in chronic diseases from sedentary lifestyles","Increased risk of obesity","Extreme events","Threat events","Cyber-attacks and disinformation campaigns","Misdiagnoses, privacy breaches, equipment malfunction, costs","Confidentiality breach in telepsychiatry consultations","Importation of cases","High number of undetected cases","Lack of protection","Workforce distancing","Airborne transmission of viruses","Transmission through airborne aerosols","Lack of specific biomarkers for covid-19 detection in wastewater","Increase in hospital waste generation during covid-19 pandemic","High infection rate via contaminated surfaces","Airborne transmission of respiratory animal viral aerosols","Transmission via respiratory droplets","Exposure to chemical and biological contaminants on stainless steel surfaces","Contamination of frequently touched surfaces"]}
